intro.speaker: Kai
intro.text: Engine's hot. Let's melt some asphalt.

intro.speaker: Vera
intro.text: Your engine is inefficient, Takeda. I've already calculated the optimal path.

alien_abduction.speaker: Kai
alien_abduction.text: What the—?! Those tentacles are coming from ABOVE!

alien_abduction.speaker: Kai
alien_abduction.text: VERA! Hold on! We're getting pulled into that ship!

alien_abduction.speaker: Vera
alien_abduction.text: Tactical analysis: We need to work together. Forget the rivalry—for now.

alien_ship_interior.speaker: Kai
alien_ship_interior.text: These corridors... they're organic. What ARE these things?

alien_ship_interior.speaker: Vera
alien_ship_interior.text: Bio-mechanical hybrids. Highly advanced. We're severely outmatched.

alien_ship_interior.speaker: Kai
alien_ship_interior.text: Then we fight smarter. You handle the tentacles on the left, I'll take the right.

alien_ship_interior.speaker: Vera
alien_ship_interior.text: ...Acceptable strategy. Don't get yourself killed, Takeda.

alien_queen_battle.speaker: Kai
alien_queen_battle.text: THAT'S the boss?! It's the size of a building!

alien_queen_battle.speaker: Vera
alien_queen_battle.text: The Alien Queen. Focus on the tentacles first—they're her attack vectors.

alien_queen_battle.speaker: Kai
alien_queen_battle.text: You take high, I'll take low. Let's show her what Neo-Tokyo is made of!

alien_queen_battle.speaker: Vera
alien_queen_battle.text: Synchronizing attack patterns. Mark your targets, Takeda.

mall_drop_start.speaker: Vera
mall_drop_start.text: *CRASH* My weapon! It's stuck on the roof!

mall_drop_start.speaker: Kai
mall_drop_start.text: Mine too. Great. Mall cops incoming and we're unarmed.

mall_drop_start.speaker: Vera
mall_drop_start.text: Improvise. Those scissors look sharp enough. Kill La Kill style?

mall_drop_start.speaker: Kai
mall_drop_start.text: Hell yeah. Let's cut through this mess!

mall_combat.speaker: Vera
mall_combat.text: The mall security system is activating. More cops inbound.

mall_combat.speaker: Kai
mall_combat.text: Good. I was getting bored. Watch this fountain move!

mall_combat.speaker: Vera
mall_combat.text: Environmental advantage noted. Using escalator as ramp.

mall_combat.speaker: Kai
mall_combat.text: Show-off. But effective. Let's clear this floor and find the exit.

mystery_hint.speaker: Vera
mystery_hint.text: Kai... those weren't normal aliens. Look at this data shard I found.

mystery_hint.speaker: Kai
mystery_hint.text: What? They're... from INSIDE Neo-Tokyo? A lab experiment?

mystery_hint.speaker: Vera
mystery_hint.text: The Academy Directors knew. This whole Midnight Exam... it's a cover-up.

mystery_hint.speaker: Kai
mystery_hint.text: Then we need to dig deeper. But first—we finish this race.

victory.speaker: Kai
victory.text: Looks like your math was off, Vector!

victory.speaker: Vera
victory.text: Recalculating... next year, Takeda. But about those aliens...

victory.speaker: Kai
victory.text: Yeah. We'll figure it out. Together?

victory.speaker: Vera
victory.text: ...Together. But I'm still beating you next time.

weapon_1.name: Redline Piston
weapon_1.description: Kai's signature weapon. Smokes constantly from overheating.

weapon_2.name: Vector Blade
weapon_2.description: Vera's precision weapon. Glows with calculated energy.

weapon_3.name: Plasma Edge
weapon_3.description: High-tech blade found in the alien ship. Deals bonus damage.

weapon_mall.name: Giant Scissors
weapon_mall.description: Improvised mall weapon. Surprisingly effective. Kill La Kill tribute.

armor_1.name: Racer Jacket
armor_1.description: Standard academy racing gear. Provides basic protection.

armor_2.name: Reinforced Plating
armor_2.description: Salvaged from alien tech. Boosts Structure significantly.

accessory_2.name: Sync Booster
accessory_2.description: When fighting alongside Vera, boosts all stats by 10%.

shard_1.title: The First Race
shard_1.content: Legend says the first Midnight Exam wasn't a race, but a riot. The academies fought for control of the Data Core, and only speed could claim victory.

shard_2.title: Azure Academy
shard_2.content: Known for precision and calculation. Vera Volkov is their top pilot, nicknamed 'Vector' for her perfect trajectories.

shard_3.title: Crimson Academy
shard_3.content: Thrives on passion and instinct. Kai Takeda embodies their 'Redline' philosophy—push until you break, then push harder.

shard_4.title: The Alien Incursion
shard_4.content: Official records claim the aliens arrived three months ago. But this data shard suggests they've been here much longer... and were CREATED here.

shard_5.title: The Mothership
shard_5.content: The massive ship hovering above Neo-Tokyo isn't alien at all. It's a bioweapon prototype from Project TITAN, gone rogue.

shard_6.title: Director's Secret
shard_6.content: The Academy Directors aren't just race organizers—they're the ones who funded Project TITAN. The Midnight Exam is a distraction while they contain the outbreak.

shard_7.title: Kai's Past
shard_7.content: Before joining Crimson Academy, Kai lost someone in a failed Midnight Exam. That's why he pushes so hard—he's running from the memory.

shard_8.title: Vera's Origin
shard_8.content: Vera isn't fully human. She's a prototype AI-human hybrid, created by Azure Academy. Her calculations are perfect because she IS a computer.

main_01.title: Midnight Exam: Sector 7
main_01.description: Race through Sector 7 and prove your academy's superiority.

main_02.title: Alien Abduction
main_02.description: Survive the alien ship and escape with Vera.

main_03.title: Mall Mayhem
main_03.description: Fight through the mall security without your weapons.

side_01.title: Data Shard Collector
side_01.description: Collect all 8 lore data shards hidden across Neo-Tokyo.

side_02.title: Perfect Sync
side_02.description: Defeat 50 enemies while fighting alongside Vera.
